Investment Adviser Representative Summary

KRISTINA ANDERSON ABARQUEZ (CRD# 4815893)

The report summary provides an overview of the Investment Adviser Representative's professional background and conduct. The information contained in this report has been provided by the Investment Adviser Representative, investment adviser and/or securities firms, and/or securities regulators as part of the states' investment adviser registration and licensing process. The information contained in this report was last updated by the Investment Adviser Representative, a previous employing firm, or a securities regulator on 02/05/2016.

DISCLOSURE INFORMATION
